description: This tables stores the overall safety information for screening forms. This includes the proceed or do not proceed decision, accompanying comments, and the editing users and times.

columns.name: SCREENING_FORM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the screening form record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FRM_PROCEED_DECISION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The screening form proceed with exam? category ID for the screening form.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Proceed


Do not proceed

columns.name: FRM_PROCEED_CMT
columns.description: The user-entered comment of the screening form, indicating why they will or will not proceed with the exam.

columns.name: PROCEED_AUD_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who edited the proceed flag for the exam.

columns.name: PROCEED_AUD_DTTM
columns.description: The instants when the proceed flag or comment was edited.
